entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
